description: Conferencing system built on Twilio, with ability to dial in and use a softphone

inputs.title: Admin Email
inputs.name: admin_email
inputs.placeholder: This is used for SSL certificates renewal notices if for some reason they fail

inputs.title: Auth Token

inputs.title: Account Sid

inputs.notes: You can find this in your Twilio account settings

inputs.title: Application Sid
inputs.name: appsid
inputs.notes: You can find this on your TwiML App's setting page
